SqlTable.SqlScriptCreate: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[Divise] ( [Divise_Ky] int IDENTITY(1,1) NOT NULL , [Divise_Codice] varchar(10) NULL , [Divise_Descrizione] nvarchar(50) NULL , [Divise_Simbolo] nvarchar(50) NULL , [Divise_Decimali] tinyint NULL , [Divise_Cambio] money NULL , [Divise_UserInsert] int NULL , [Divise_UserUpdate] int NULL , [Divise_UserDelete] int NULL , [Divise_DateInsert] datetime NULL , [Divise_DateUpdate] datetime NULL , [Divise_DateDelete] datetime NULL , [Lingue_Ky] tinyint NULL , [Divise_Ordine] int NULL ) ALTER TABLE [dbo].[Divise] ADD CONSTRAINT PK_BDivise PRIMARY KEY ([Divise_Ky])
